name: Omero Download
title: Retrieve data from the OMERO NCATS server
description: This plugin allows to retrieve the microscopy image data from the OMERO NCATS server.
author: Hamdah Shafqat Abbasi (hamdahshafqat.abbasi@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: dataType
inputs.title: dataType
inputs.description: The supported object types to be retreived.

inputs.name: name
inputs.title: name
inputs.description: Name of the object to be downloaded.

inputs.name: objectId
inputs.title: objectId
inputs.description: Identifier of the object to be downloaded.
